Package com.hitlabnz.outdoorar.api

Interface Summary
OALocationEventManager.OALocationEventListener Interface to listen to location events
 

Class Summary
OAAPI API class for using ready-to-use components.
OAARComponent A ready-to-use component for AR visualization.
OAARComponentBase An abstract base class for AR visualization components
OAARVRViewComponent View for 3D scene visualization This class gives you access to controls for the 3D scene view.
OACompassHelperViewComponent  
OAComponent An abstract base class for components, equivalent to Activity class in Android SDK.
OAIconSource A ready-to-use icon source class.
OAIconSourceBase A base class for icon sources used in map components.
OAListComponent A ready-to-use component for list visualization.
OAListComponentBase An abstract base class for list visualization components
OAListSceneAdapter Basic adapter class for making custom layout for list items in list components.
OALocationEventManager Location manager monitors scenes/locations of interest, and triggers events when the user arrives at or leaves from the scene/location.
OAMapComponent A ready-to-use component for map visualization.
OAMapComponentBase An abstract base class for map visualization components
OAMapViewComponent View for map visualization
OANotificationBubbleView MapBubble displays basic info about a scene with a callout to the scene's position on the map
OAScene A class representing a scene, or a point of interest.
OASensorManager A class that manages sensor information for tracking user's location and motion.
OASoundManager
